post.author: 이성기
post.content:
I came across your profile in our database and was curious to know if you were still in the job market? If so I have an opportunity that may interest you. I''ve included the details below. If interested please send me an updated copy of your resume and give me a convenient time for me to call you to discuss this opportunity in more detail.
Location: Hamilton, ON Duration: 6 months
Cheers, Anthony DeCarmo Resource Manager 416-777-1708 x235 anthony.decarmo@provisionit.ca www.provisionit.ca
Job Description: Our Client, a leading Steel manufacturing company has an immediate need for a senior software developer on an initial 6 month assignment Develop, enhance and remediate software programs used for process automation systems to integrate with a new plant wide Manufacturing Execution System (MES). Develop and carry out acceptance testing procedures to make sure all parts of the system are working properly Deliver high quality results within project schedule timelines.
Expert Knowledge in Application Development & Software Design J2SE / Java J2EE (Working) PL/SQL PRO*C / C Subversion (code management system) Eclipse Development Environment for Java development Expert Knowledge in Oracle Database Design and Data Modeling Expert Knowledge in Database Tools Oracle Designer SQL*Plus Expert Knowledge in Database Extract-Transform-Load Applications and Technologies experience with Altova MapForce preferred Working knowledge of VMS, UNIX, and XP environments
post.title: Job #3428: Senior SW Developer
